title: Randall Niâ€™s Website
text:
Welcome to my website! I am a third year student in the Bachelor of Information program focusing on user experience design.
I strongly advocate for human centred design methods, and I love long walks to my fridge. Currently seeking 2023 summer opportunities!

title: Portfolio
text:
Some of the data science projects that I have created includes:

Examining Police Expenditure and Rate of Major Crime, which is an R package about Toronto police expenditure and rate of solved major crimes.
The Differences between the 1918 Influenza and COVID-19 Pandemic, which is an R package examining the differences between the Influenza data and COVID-19 data.
